oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various statements are given with regard to the nature and movements of the celestial bodies. The first of these treats of the Moon and Stars, ending with the Bushman-rice Star Canopus (B I. 291-294... An incantation to the Moon and stars. 1) This story is found in Book I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Moon and stars: an incantation
